stimulusHtml:
Correctly attribute the work shown to the nineteenth-century artist who created it.

Using specific visual evidence, justify your attribution by describing at least two relevant similarities between the work shown and another work by the same artist.

Using specific evidence, explain at least two ways in which the work was influenced by Romanticism.

features.html: Philadelphia Museum of Art, Pennsylvania, PA, USA The John Howard McFadden Collection/Bridgeman Images
